title: 104_hr2631
content: American Indian Trust Fund Management Reform Act Amendments of 1995 - Amends the American Indian Trust Fund Management Reform Act of 1994 to grant the Office of Special Trustee for American Indians direct administrative authority over the human and financial resources supporting the provision of Indian financial trust services. Provides for the transfer of such functions from the Bureau of Indian Affairs to the Office. Establishes a four-year term of Special Trustee, unless otherwise terminated.
